alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 9:45AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 1030 AM MST... At 944 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Maricopa, or 21 miles west of Casa Grande, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Maricopa, Estrella Sailport, Mobile and Ak-Chin Village. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 146 and 154. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 27 and 43. AZ Route 347 between mile markers 161 and 172. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County
